tb_addr_map_tmp2.create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TB_ADDR_MAP_TMP ( BJD_CD VARCHAR2(10), SIDO_NM VARCHAR2(50), SIGG_NM VARCHAR2(50), EMD_NM VARCHAR2(50), RI_NM VARCHAR2(50), SAN_CK VARCHAR2(1), JIBUN_MAIN VARCHAR2(20), JIBUN_SUB VARCHAR2(20), RD_CD VARCHAR2(255), RD_NM VARCHAR2(255), GRND_CK VARCHAR2(1), BLDNO_MAIN VARCHAR2(20), BLDNO_SUB VARCHAR2(20), BLD_NM VARCHAR2(50), BLD_DETAIL VARCHAR2(100), BLD_MNGNO VARCHAR2(50), EMD_SERIAL VARCHAR2(2), HJD_CD VARCHAR2(10), HJD_NM VARCHAR2(50), ZIP_CODE VARCHAR2(6), COL21 VARCHAR2(3), COL22 VARCHAR2(40), COL23 VARCHAR2(2), COL24 VARCHAR2(8), COL25 VARCHAR2(25), COL26 VARCHAR2(200), GONGDONG_YN VARCHAR2(1), COL28 VARCHAR2(5), COL29 VARCHAR2(1), COL30 VARCHAR2(15), COL31 VARCHAR2(15) );
tb_addr_map_tmp2.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ADDR_MAP_TMP ( BJD_CD, SIDO_NM, SIGG_NM, EMD_NM, RI_NM, SAN_CK, JIBUN_MAIN, JIBUN_SUB, RD_CD, RD_NM, GRND_CK, BLDNO_MAIN, BLDNO_SUB, BLD_NM, BLD_DETAIL, BLD_MNGNO, EMD_SERIAL, HJD_CD, HJD_NM, ZIP_CODE, COL21, COL22, COL23, COL24, COL25, COL26, GONGDONG_YN, COL28, COL29,COL30, COL31 ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? );

tb_addr_map_temp_ref_jibun.create:
CREATE TABLE TB_ADDR_MAP_TEMP_REF_JIBUN ( BJD_CD VARCHAR2(10), SIDO_NM VARCHAR2(40), SIGG_NM VARCHAR2(40), EMD_NM VARCHAR2(40), RI_NM VARCHAR2(40), SAN_CK VARCHAR2(1), JIBUN_MAIN VARCHAR2(4), JIBUN_SUB VARCHAR2(4), RD_CD VARCHAR2(12), GRND_CK VARCHAR2(1), BLDNO_MAIN VARCHAR2(5), BLDNO_SUB VARCHAR2(5), EMD_SERIAL VARCHAR2(10), MOVE_CODE VARCHAR2(2)
);
tb_addr_map_temp_ref_jibun.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ADDR_MAP_TEMP_REF_JIBUN ( BJD_CD, SIDO_NM, SIGG_NM, EMD_NM, RI_NM, SAN_CK, JIBUN_MAIN, JIBUN_SUB, RD_CD, GRND_CK, BLDNO_MAIN, BLDNO_SUB, EMD_SERIAL, MOVE_CODE ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? );
